Class scanMan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      scanMan(java.awt.Panel p)
      This constructor creates a scanMan PFigure with the with the starting location and size specified by the constants that lives on the panel that is passed as a parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • scanMan

        public scanMan(java.awt.Panel p)
        This constructor creates a scanMan PFigure with the with the starting location and size specified by the constants that lives on the panel that is passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        p - The panel for which the game is played on.

    • Method Detail

      • keyDownReciver

        public static void keyDownReciver(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt)
        This method receives data on what keys are pressed and stores player directional information to a point.
        Up arrow = (0, -1)
        Down arrow = (0, 1)
        Left arrow = (-1, 0)
        Right arrow = (1, 0)
        Parameters:
        evt - The information about what key was pressed.

      • move

        public void move(int deltaX,
                 int deltaY)
        Description copied from class: PFigure
        This method moves the figure from its current position deltaX and deltaY pixels.
        Overrides:
        move in class PFigure
        Parameters:
        deltaX - The change in X the figure should move by.
        deltaY - The change in Y the figure should move by.

      • move

        public void move()
        This method moves the player figure at in the x and y direction depending upon what the value of x and y are in userInputData. If the player figure hits a wall, it refuses to let the player go further in the direction of the wall it hit, and if necessary moves it back onto the panel.
        Overrides:
        move in class PFigure
